about.title: Hello! I'm <primaryUnderline>Dávid Pap</primaryUnderline>,
about.body: <skyUnderline>DevOps/Cloud Engineer</skyUnderline> in Sonrisa's team, where I work on the development, operation and automation of cloud-based infrastructures. I completed my studies at the University of Pannonia in <pinkUnderline>Data Science</pinkUnderline> which was my master's degree, and before that, I studied <pinkUnderline>Computer Science</pinkUnderline> as my bachelor's degree, I also hold an AWS SysOps Administrator certificate. In addition to software development, my areas of interest include their operation and infrastructure, including <indigoUnderline>containerization, orchestration, system design and monitoring tasks</indigoUnderline>. <break /> I regularly follow new technologies and consider continuous learning important. In my free time, I enjoy learning about them, IoT projects, electronics, and I am also interested in history and geography.

projects.name: Portfolio site
projects.description: A page whose sole purpose is to introduce myself and for you to learn about my previous projects

projects.name: Bachelor's Thesis
projects.description: In my thesis, I created an in-line WAF tool that inspects the content of HTTP requests. I implemented a traditional signature-based method and a method that uses a Machine Learning approach.

projects.name: Image processing
projects.description: The project was prepared for an image processing class, where filters had to be implemented in OpenCV (in C++) based on given mathematical formulas and convolution kernels

projects.name: Master's Thesis (MSc)
projects.description: In my thesis, I analyzed multilayer commercial networks using, among other things, centrality metrics, unsupervised machine learning methods, and deep learning systems (Autoencoders, Graph Neural Networks).

projects.name: Observability project
projects.description: This project is an observability stack that demonstrates how to collect and visualize metrics, logs, and traces from an application. The stack runs Prometheus, Loki, Tempo, and Grafana.

projects.name: AI assitant
projects.description: This project is a Hungarian-language AI voice assistant for customer service, combining Speech-to-Text, Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Large Language Models (LLM), and Text-to-Speech. It runs as a set of containerized microservices.
